TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadDataCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadDataCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadDataCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadDataCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type UploadDataCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * UploadDataCompletedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento di un oggetto .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando si crea un delegato , si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Per altre informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples L'esempio di codice seguente illustra in modo asincrono il caricamento di dati.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#34)] Il metodo seguente viene chiamato quando viene completato il caricamento.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#35)]
